text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus areolatus is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description: The cap is 3 to 7 centimetres (1.2 to 2.8 in) in diameter.
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus areolatus typically grows clumped together on stumps, and logs of hardwoods and palms. It is found in Cuba in May and September.
